testcase.name: poor diarization should trigger fallback mode
diarization quality should be UNKNOWN initially
manual role swap should work even in fallback mode
DER calculation should meet acceptance criteria
frequent manual swaps should trigger fallback mode

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: Expected value to be true.
